#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t>0)
    {
        int area;
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        n /= 2;
        if(n%2==0)
            area = n/2*n/2;
        else
        {
            float m = n/2;
            int p = m;
            area = p*(p+1);
        }
        printf("%d\n",area);
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
